description:
Determined not to be defeated by the heinous hair of a devious lion, Chopper risks life and limb by summoning the power of his Rumble Ball for a third time!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chopper e la sfera rombante proibita
Chopper est incontrôlable ! La Rumble Ball de trop
Seigyo Funou! Chopper Kindan no Rumble
خارج عن السّيطرة! رامبل تشوبّر المحظورة!
制御不能! チョッパー禁断のランブル
